headline: Two injured in knife incident at Bedfordshire school - BBC News

annotations.paragraph: Two people have been injured at a secondary school following reports a student had a knife.

annotations.paragraph: Bedfordshire Police was called to Manshead Church of England Academy in Dunstable Road, Caddington, at 13:40 BST.

annotations.paragraph: A teenager was "quickly detained by police" and the two victims were taken to hospital with minor injuries.
